introduction.title:
Miami Week
Dec 4-10, 2017
introduction.description: For one week a year, Miami becomes a global destination for art, design, music and all things visual culture. Each fair brings together the most influential collectors, gallerists, designers, curators and critics from around the world in celebration of design culture and commerce.

artsy_in_miami.title: Artsy in Miami
artsy_in_miami.description: Collective Structures explores the relationship between individual artists and their mental landscape through a series of spatial installations. It will unfold in multiple chapters, across distinct spaces of the Bath Club, drawing on the historic building. The physical and sensory experiences strive to place viewers at a crossroads between current reality and imagined narrative.
artsy_in_miami.public_viewing_date:
Public Viewing
December 7 12:00pm–6:00pm
The Bath Club
5937 Collins Ave, Miami Beach
